sentences.en: Alain Prost finished third and virtually conceded the world championship.
sentences.cn: 阿兰·普罗斯特以第三名的成绩结束比赛，实际上已经将世界冠军的位置拱手让人。

sentences.en: As she finished each song, the crowd clapped wildly.
sentences.cn: 她每唱完一首歌，人群就拼命鼓掌。

sentences.en: As soon as he'd finished eating, he excused himself.
sentences.cn: 他一吃完就告辞离开了。

sentences.en: Davies finished almost two seconds in arrears for third place.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯落后了差不多两秒，获得第三名。

sentences.en: He finished second in the championship four years in a row.
sentences.cn: 他连续4年获得锦标赛亚军。

sentences.en: If I get this report finished I'll knock off early.
sentences.cn: 如果我写完这篇报告，我就会早点下班。

sentences.en: If the weather relents, the game will be finished today.
sentences.cn: 如果天气转好的话，比赛将在今天结束。

sentences.en: If you ever cross him, forget it, you're finished.
sentences.cn: 如果你曾经和他作对过，就别想了，你没戏了。

sentences.en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentences.cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentences.en: She finished putting the milk away and turned around.
sentences.cn: 她把牛奶收好后转过身来。

sentences.en: She finished third in the world cross-country championships in Antwerp.
sentences.cn: 她在安特卫普的世界越野锦标赛上获得了第3名。

sentences.en: Simon finished dialing and clamped the phone to his ear.
sentences.cn: 西蒙拨完号，把听筒贴在耳边。

sentences.en: The American dollar finished the day up against foreign currencies.
sentences.cn: 美元汇率今日收盘时有所上涨。

sentences.en: There were few dry eyes in the house when I finished.
sentences.cn: 我说完后房间里没几个人不掉泪的。

sentences.en: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married.
sentences.cn: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

words.tran_cn: 完成；结束；用完；vi. 结束，终止；终结；n. 结束；完美；回味（葡萄酒）
完成；结束；毁掉（finish的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 成品皮革；整饰过的皮革
[化]加工表面；已加工面，完成面

trans.tran_cn: 完成了的，技术高超的，精湛的，〈俚〉死了的，完蛋了的
trans.tran_en: no longer doing, dealing with, or using something

trans.tran_cn: 结束，完成( finish的过去式和过去分词)
